name: Monster Matchmaking
description:
Being a monster is scary business. Finding love, too? Terrifying.

Team up with Sebastian, an aloof skeletal groundskeeper, to revive the family matchmaking business left behind by your late grandfather. Find clients their perfect match in a fast-paced sorting game or suffer grave consequences when they lose patience.

Oh, and your clients? They're all monsters.

Manage clientele, speed through matches, and end the day... alive, at least.

Monster art: Grotto Escape Chibi Monsters by ansimuz
